Introduce.welcome: Hi Dear, Welcome to my personal website

About.title: About
About.description: Hello again. I am Sajad Mahdian, a Front-End Developer with over 6 years of experience in web application development. My expertise lies in flexible and optimized programming using ReactJs and related technologies such as Redux and Next.js. My strong ability to understand UI/UX and user experience is among my outstanding qualities. I am ready to participate in a specialized and dynamic team and help advance complex projects.
About.guiding-to-resume: To help you become more familiar with my skills, I have provided my resume for download below. I've kept it concise to make it easier to review.

responsibility.1: Created responsive user interfaces for research project showcases

responsibility.3: Collaborated with research teams to present complex technical information
